name: dbcache
description: Make cache from DynamoDB to Redis

scripts.transpile: rm -Rf build && mkdir -p build && cp -R src/* build/
scripts.create: npm run transpile && SLS_DEBUG=* serverless deploy -v
scripts.deploy:restaurant: SLS_DEBUG=* serverless deploy function -s dev -f dbupdate_restaurant -v
scripts.deploy:branch: SLS_DEBUG=* serverless deploy function -s dev -f dbupdate_branch -v
scripts.deploy:item: SLS_DEBUG=* serverless deploy function -s dev -f dbupdate_item -v
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:restaurant && npm run deploy:branch && npm run deploy:item
scripts.release: npm run transpile && SLS_DEBUG=* serverless deploy function -s prod -f dbupdate  -v
scripts.start: npm run transpile && SLS_DEBUG=* serverless offline start

author: RainaWLK
